title: 179: Reading Our F*cking Minds w/ Thomas Dale
itunes:title: 179: Reading Our F*cking Minds w/ Thomas Dale
description:
The Broads are joined by the hilarious and incredible Thomas Dale, a stand up comedian turned clairvoyant and medium. They chat about discovering his abilities at a young age and how he transitioned from comedian to clairvoyant. He then dives into readings with Bekah and Jess and it gets personal as they discuss family, past relationships, children, are visited by departed loved ones and more. Needless to say, Broads, they are obsessed with Thomas Dale. 
THOMAS DALE: 
Follow Thomas on Instagram at: https://instagram.com/thomasdale5 (https://www.youtube.com/redirect?redir_token=QUFFLUhqbXJpR0ZnSXBHZWwwbWN0eURvbnlad0ViMjhjd3xBQ3Jtc0ttMGxSSmRlTHA2eDQ1dWtQNnFqNG1ESXhRVTctZjRHUHZqMjdtSmdrNFMtWFBGaUplbGxIdi1jeFVpdzVSU0hmVWxZTUJnUFhNM3J3aDIxUDhzSnVZSkswQ1BuMjJwdE9fTkxha0pwVGtlbGEwSElsSQ%3D%3D&q=https%3A%2F%2Finstagram.com%2Fthomasdale5&v=KLcVI7Ze5jQ&event=video_description)
Book a reading with him by DM at @thomasdale5
